column9: Olympic Capital (IOC HQ) and EPFL university.

Gateway to the Vaud Alps and thermal springs.
A cultural bridge between French and German-speaking Switzerland.
Home to the Matterhorn Verbier and Crans-Montana
The Federal Capital. Medieval Old Town (UNESCO).
The "Watch Valley". Home to Rolex Omega and Swatch
Gateway to the Jungfrau Region and "The Top of Europe".
The historic heart of the Swiss Confederation.
The suburban ring of the financial capital.
The "Downtown" code. Banking Finance and Bahnhofstrasse.
Former industrial powerhouse; now a museum and university hub.
Pharma capital of the world (Novartis/Roche) and Art Basel.
Textile history and the Abbey Library (UNESCO).
Italian-speaking Switzerland. "The sunny living room" of the country.
